Title: Requires the department of transportation to study the regional fairness of state funding for local roadway paving purposes
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to study the regional fairness of state funding for local roadway paving purposes, including but not limited to the Consolidated Local Street and Highway Improvement Program (CHIPS), State Touring Routes program, PAVE-NY, Pave Our Potholes (POP), and other existing local roadway aid programs, and to make recommendations concerning the reinstatement of the suburban highway improvement program (SHIPS) funding program.
ActClause: AN ACT to require the department of transportation to study the regional fairness of state funding for local roadway paving purposes; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
